control_attributes.Control: SI-3 (4) UPDATES ONLY BY PRIVILEGED USERS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system updates malicious code protection mechanisms only when directed by a privileged user.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system implements nonsignature-based malicious code detection mechanisms.
